name: Bathroom Break 2: Office Invasion!
description:
SUPER SPECIAL SNEAK PREVIEW

An eventual sequel to Bathroom Break! Play as the office janitor as you utilize your mop and your violent rage to launch invaders out of your way as you desperately attempt to mop up every last remnant of vomit.

Janitorial Priorities include:

1. Clean the office

2. Launch invaders aside (and juggle them for tactical advantage!)

3. Defend Earth
